summary: Instead of +10% one-handed damage, Deathbrand Gauntlets now grant +10% two-handed damage for each piece of the set equipped.
descriptionHtml:
This is a simple modification of the Deathbrand Gauntlets\' enchantment, replacing the +10% one-handed damage bonus per equipped piece with +10% two-handed damage. I created this mod because I wanted to use the Bloodskal Blade alongside the Deathbrand set without forfeiting the gauntlets\' enchantment bonus.

Presumably, this mod will lower Haknir Death-Brand\'s attack damage when you fight his spirit in Gyldenhuk Barrow, since he will no longer have +40% one-handed damage for his dual scimitars. For this reason, I recommend installing this mod after defeating him.

Obviously, the Dragonborn DLC is required for this mod.

Please report any bugs and I will do my best to fix them.
author: Sechrima
